fetch_puzzles.query: select id,title,`date`,forecolor,backcolor,textcolor,scale,z_min,preview,rating,difficulty,plays from puzzles ?where? order by `date` desc

fetch_puzzle_paths.query: select text,shapes_outline,shapes_inline from puzzles where id=?puzzle_id?

fetch_collection_top_rated.query: select id,title,`date`,forecolor,backcolor,textcolor,scale,z_min,preview,rating from puzzles order by `rating` desc limit ?count?

fetch_collection_editors_choice.query: select id,title,`date`,forecolor,backcolor,textcolor,scale,z_min,preview,rating from puzzles where featured=1 order by `date` desc

fetch_collection_top_played.query: select id,title,`date`,forecolor,backcolor,textcolor,scale,z_min,preview,rating,plays from puzzles order by plays desc limit ?count?

fetch_rating.query: select rating from ratings where username=?username? and puzzle_id=?puzzle_id?

fetch_difficulty.query: select difficulty from difficulties where username=?username? and puzzle_id=?puzzle_id?

user_exists.query: select exists(select 1 from people where username=?username? limit 1) as taken

activate.query: update people set enabled=true where username=?username?

fetch_user_plays.query: select count(*) as times, min(duration) as fastest from plays where username=?username? and puzzle_id=?puzzle_id?

fetch_works.query: select id,title,`text`,`date`,description,license from works where author=?username? order by `date` desc, title asc

fetch_work_fragments.query: select f.id as id, f.puzzle_id as puzzle_id, p.title as puzzle_title from fragments f inner join puzzles p on f.puzzle_id=p.id where f.work_id=?work_id? group by puzzle_id

fetch_puzzle_fragments.query: select f.id as id, f.work_id as work_id, f.fragment as fragment, w.title as title, w.description as description, w.author as author, w.license as license, w.`date` as `date` from fragments f inner join works w on f.work_id=w.id where f.puzzle_id=?puzzle_id?

delete_user.query: update people set deleted=1 where username=?username?

recover_user.query: update people set deleted=0 where username=?username?
